extendedInfo.description: eDoctor, Inc. e-Prescribing Solution for Android. This application is only available to eDoctor, Inc.account holders. Please visit www.edoctorinc.com or call us at 1-800-951-1513 for more information.eDoctor, Inc. offers a Surescripts-certified, MIPPA-compliant electronic prescription system. Ouraward-winning NewCrop software offers the following benefits:- Meaningful Use benefits compliant with participating NewCrop EMR/EHR vendors- Software easily migrated to a partner EMR/EHR- Unlimited use of our standalone e-prescribing system- Electronic refills and renewals- Managed care formularies and drug history via Surescripts Medication History- Customizable favorite medication and pharmacy list- Drug-to-drug, drug-to-allergy, drug-to-condition, drug-to-age, drug-to-gender, and dose checking- Mail order supported- Includes formularies (via RxHub)- Unlimited call support and access to online interactive trainingAccount holders can also access our faxing, mobile platform, and data migration services. (NOTE:Faxing of e-prescriptions does not count towards the MIPPA incentives program. Only end-to-endelectronic filing of Medicare prescriptions, via participating electronic pharmacies, is considered.)Thousands of users access their eDoctor, Inc. accounts daily. If you are a credentialed medicalprofessional seeking to streamline your office or receive MIPPA benefits, contact us today!Update:-changes to the first input box for 'account number' to '10-digit phone number' to facilitate in ease of use- change Login Page design

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: Should be able to search for patient names...not just authorize refill requests. No keyboard comes up when I try to search for patient, won\'t let me type at all
reviews.author: A Google User
